_comment: Populate this file with food items (matching classification output). Preferred format: "food_item": {"density": value_g_cm3, "calories_kcal_per_100g": value_kcal_100g}. Legacy format (density only): "food_item": value_g_cm3. Example: "apple_fuji_raw": {"density": 0.75, "calories_kcal_per_100g": 50.0}
